killers.name: The Woodsman
killers.description: A hulking figure in a wooden mask and tattered forest ranger uniform. Carries a massive woodcutting axe.
killers.signature: Leaves behind pine needles and wooden splinters
killers.style: Methodical and territorial, uses the environment
killers.background: Legend says he was a forest ranger who went mad protecting his woods

killers.name: The Maskmaker
killers.description: Wears a porcelain doll mask with different expressions painted on each side. Dressed in a vintage carnival worker's outfit.
killers.style: Theatrical and psychological, likes to toy with victims
killers.background: Once a talented maskmaker who lost his family at a carnival

killers.name: The Groundskeeper
killers.description: Sports a burlap sack mask with crude stitching. Wears dirty coveralls covered in soil.
killers.signature: Trails of disturbed earth and garden tools
killers.style: Brutal and direct, uses gardening tools as weapons
killers.background: Former school groundskeeper who snapped after years of abuse
